benchmark_details.name: HW-NL2Workflow
benchmark_details.overview: The HW-NL2Workflow dataset includes 3,695 real-world business samples for training and evaluation, designed to enhance the automation of workflow construction from natural language instructions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for the NL2Workflow task to boost research and development in workflow automation.

data.source: 3,695 workflows collected from an enterprise platform, each annotated by domain experts.
data.annotation: Annotated by domain experts with natural language instructions.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the alignment of generated workflows with ground truth workflows.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates in Exact Match Rate, Arrangement Accuracy, and Parameter Accuracy indicate better model performance in workflow generation.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparison against baseline models like GPT-4o, Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct, demonstrating superior performance with an EMR of 52.7%.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted to evaluate the effectiveness of the WorkTeam framework.
